name: HPM Diet - Cat  D1 Dermatology Support
b2c_short_description:
A therapeutic dry cat food to support skin function and manage medium- and long-term skin and coat conditions. Suitable for cats with dermatosis (non-inflammatory skin problems), excessive hair loss*, dermatitis or pruritus (itching).

(*When cat food allergies are not suspected.)
b2c_full_description:
Product Details

Help your cat to find fast relief from skin and coat disorders with VETERINARY HPM® Dermatology Support Food for Cats. Suitable for cats with dermatosis, excessive hair loss, dermatitis and itching.

Dermatological conditions can damage the natural skin barrier and lead to irritation, itching, redness, poor coat condition and excessive hair loss in cats. VETERINARY HPM® Dermatology Support is a complete and balanced food made with an expert blend of ingredients to help manage common dermatologic conditions, control inflammation and restore your cat’s skin and coat health.

Dermatology Support is rich in high-quality animal proteins, providing  sulphur amino acids that promote skin healing and hair regrowth. It also features our signature DERMA Plus complex with essential nutrients to promote recovery and protection from dermatological conditions: 

• Omega 3 fatty acids (including EPA and DHA). 
• Omega 6 fatty acids (including linoleic acid). 
• Antioxidant vitamins A and E.  

VETERINARY HPM® Dermatology Support is suitable for cats of all ages and breeds. In pets with suspected cat food allergies or intolerances, we recommend trying the VETERINARY HPM® Allergy range first.
seo_product_title: Dermatology Support Cat Food – Healthy Skin & Shiny Coat
seo_meta_description: Soothe your cat’s skin with VETERINARY HPM® Dermatology Support. Reduces hair loss. Rich in Omega-3 & antioxidants
composition_ingredients_additives_notes: Dehydrated pork and poultry proteins, potato starch, peas, hydrolysed pork and poultry proteins, minerals, lignocellulose, animal fats, fish oil, beet pulp, sunflower oil, brewer’s yeast, borage seed, psyllium fibre (Plantago (L.) spp.), fructo-oligosaccharides, hydrolysed crustacean (source of chitosan), chondroitin sulfate, Lactobacillus acidophilus.
composition: Dehydrated pork and poultry proteins, potato starch, peas, hydrolysed pork and poultry proteins, minerals, lignocellulose, animal fats, fish oil, beet pulp, sunflower oil, brewer’s yeast, borage seed, psyllium fibre (Plantago (L.) spp.), fructo-oligosaccharides, hydrolysed crustacean (source of chitosan), chondroitin sulfate, Lactobacillus acidophilus.
